data.text:
This ongoing project originally came out of a course-based collaborative project that I was a part of in the Spring of 2013. As a part of a course called “Media Installations” the class was tasked with a collecting as many examples as possible of various kinds of media based installations. My aim here is to better catalogue and organize the findings from this course, and to continue to adding materials over time.
